Dário Vieira Conceição

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/1142876099153789
  • Última atualização do currículo em 20/11/2017

Possui graduação em Informática pela Universidade Federal de Viçosa (1996), mestrado em Ciência da Computação pela Universidade Estadual de Campinas (1998), e PhD em Ciência da Computação pelo Institut National des télécommunications (2005) na França. Tem experiência na área de Ciência da Computação, com ênfase em Rede de Computadores e Engenharia de Software, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: network protocols, session maintenance protocols, distributed systems, fixed/mobile networks (BGP, P2P, Ad Hoc networks, ...), validation of network protocols and services. (Texto informado pelo autor)

Projetos de pesquisa
2017 - Atual
Study of Advanced Mobility and Traffic Safety Technologies using a Virtual Reality and Motion-based Driving Simulation Environment
Descrição: This project proposes to study the effects of advanced mobility and traffic safety technologies using the virtual reality and interactive simulation environment at the University of Nevada Las Vegas. This environment has been developed, through student exchange over the last four years, by the two institutions proposing this project. Examples of technologies that can be studied using the proposed environment include: (a) autonomous vehicles, (b) demand-responsive pedestrian and bicycle rumble strips, (c) demand-responsive traffic signals, (d) connected vehicles, and (e) transit information. Development and field testing of these technologies involving actual users is too expensive, time consuming, and/or unsafe. Statistical and cognitive analyses will be performed to draw insights from large numbers of samples, survey questionnaires, and physiological measurements..
Situação: Em andamento; Natureza: Pesquisa.

Integrantes: Dário Vieira Conceição - Coordenador / Alexander Paz-Cruz - Integrante.
Financiador(es): Thomas Jefferson Fund - Cooperação.
2010 - Atual
ViSuWAVE: Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments
Situação: Em andamento; Natureza: Pesquisa.

Integrantes: Dário Vieira Conceição - Coordenador.
2008 - 2009
ITEA2 HDTVnext
Situação: Concluído; Natureza: Pesquisa.

Integrantes: Dário Vieira Conceição - Integrante / Yacine Ghamri-Doudane - Coordenador.
2007 - 2008
Twins project
Descrição: Challenging topics in this development mode that need special attention include: verification and validation of requirements and architecture models, test-case generation from requirements and/or models, and hard- and software change management and configuration management during co-design. Addressing those topics in an interdisciplinary way and designing co-design system-flow, techniques and tools will improve complex distributed and real-time embedded systems in the avionics, copier & printer, power supply and electronics industries..
Situação: Concluído; Natureza: Pesquisa.

Integrantes: Dário Vieira Conceição - Integrante / Nicky Williams - Coordenador.
Financiador(es): (Information Technology for European Advancement - Auxílio financeiro.

L'objectif est d'établir des relations de coopération, en particulier dans le développement de programmes d'échanges académiques et culturels moyennant l'aide mutuelle dans les domaines de l'éducation, de la recherche et du développement..
